Uses of Class
advjava.assessment1.zuul.refactored.cmds.Command

  • Packages that use Command 
    Package Description
    advjava.assessment1.zuul.refactored.cmds  
    advjava.assessment1.zuul.refactored.cmds.builtin  

    • Uses of Command in advjava.assessment1.zuul.refactored.cmds

      Methods in advjava.assessment1.zuul.refactored.cmds that return Command 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Command CommandManager.getCommand(java.lang.String name)
      Get a particular command based on its command name
      Methods in advjava.assessment1.zuul.refactored.cmds that return types with arguments of type Command 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

    • Uses of Command in advjava.assessment1.zuul.refactored.cmds.builtin

      Subclasses of Command in advjava.assessment1.zuul.refactored.cmds.builtin 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DebugCommand
      A debug command added for the benefit of myself the creator.
      class  DropCommand
      The Drop is designed to allow the player to drop items from their inventory into the current room.
      class  GiveCommand
      The GiveCommand is designed to allow the player to give items from their inventory to other characters in the game.
      class  GoCommand
      The Go Command is designed to move the player from the existing room to another room that is an exit from the current room.
      class  HelpCommand
      The Help Command is designed to print every command currently loaded in the CommandManager including their description and name.
      class  LookCommand
      The look command reprints the rooms current information, or if a parameter is specified it will try to find a character in the room to print details on otherwise return an error to the player.
      class  QuitCommand
      Used to quit the game, calls the game.terminate() method which sets a flag to end the game loop.
      class  TakeCommand
      The Take command is used when a player wants to pickup an item from the current room they're in.
